website_summaries.verdict: These sleek, versatile slip-on sneakers offer a great blend of fashion and function.
pros: Mesh sneakers are both lightweight and durable
Equipped with anti-collision toe caps that make the sneakers ideal for various outdoor activities
Come in several attractive colors to match your child's personal style perfectly
cons: Toe areas tend to be narrow

customer_reviews.title: Best summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son as a replacement for his favorite pair of shoes. He absolutely loves these and wears them everywhere. We haven’t used them for pool shoes, but for regular summer shoes he can wear without socks. They are very comfortable and easy to clean. We got the bright green/yellow color and I’ll say they are very colorful. They’ve been easy to keep up with at crowded bouncy houses or anywhere else kids run around with no shoes. I would definitely recommend these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer!
customer_reviews.text: These are good shoes for running around in the water park( back in the day). This was my second purchase as my toddler had outgrown her previous pairs. My first purchase, the shoes were a perfect but this time they were a little loose and big for her. I kept them coz you know, she’ll grow into them. I like the mesh fabric quality, color options and non slip sole. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: great for Beach, pool or waterpark
customer_reviews.text: Measure all your kid's foot. My 3yr old son wears an 8, I measured his foot to 5.75" so I ordered size 8.5 according to chart and thinking it will fit for the summer. The shoes were a size 8 for kids, so they were HUGE on my son. Then we ordered these second pair a size 7 and the fit perfect! We are going to use them today but when i tried them they seemed pretty comfy and the spandex seems to help help to that he doesn't get hurt at the top!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my daughters size but the first thing I noticed was these shoes are too big for the size it claims to be. Then I noticed the white rubber material on the front and sides of the shoes are on the black parts of the shoes and looks really cheaply made :( they look so cute In the picture and maybe I would have reordered in a smaller size but not if they look sloppy and badly made in reality :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and practical shoes!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our 2-year-old so she could play in the water features at the playground easily in the same shoes she was already wearing. She wears these as her main sneakers and if we come across a puddle or splash ground, she's ready to go without having to change. They are working perfectly. They dry quickly and are easy to clean. Good price and glad they have some gender-neutral colors (we got the grey and orange). She seems to find them comfortable, doesn't try to take them off or anything like that. I originally ordered big after seeing the other reviews, but ended up getting something closer to the same size she's wearing in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoes for my toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pairs for my twins for the summer; they're happy with them! Easy to put on, to take off, and perfect for the summer. I'm really pleased with the soft material of the shoe and the harder material for the sole/toe cover. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lunamer

customer_reviews.title: as described, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: my kids have wide feet but this shoe was fine for them due to the stretchy top fabric, despite it being a normal width shoe. both kids have work this shoe, and it's still in great condition so i'll be passing it down to my friend's kid next
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my granddaughter. I love the fact she can put them on herself. They are a great fit considering many toddlers have a thick foot. I can hand wash them when they get dirty. The orange color is so vibrant. They are especially useful to walk in the grass or even to wear in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: md

customer_reviews.title: Perfect play shoe for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter for the beach, pool or just playing in the backyard. She is 2 and can easily put them on and take them off. Good support, no need for socks. I've also washed them twice in my washer machine and they held up great.
customer_reviews.author: JennZ

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My kids wear a 10 but I read the reviews and bought an 11 and they are too tight.
customer_reviews.author: LKon

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old LOVES these and they stand up well to the abuse they get. However the insole's glue does wear off easily and now flops around whenever they get wet. This is uncomfortable for the 3yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at an even better price
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is perfect for the beach or the pool. Great fit and quality. It has a sturdy sole so there is enough support for my toddler but still light-weight enough to be used in the water. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Bettie

customer_reviews.title: HUGE and poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these for my daughter, but unfortunately they were enormous. And they look very cheaply made. I guess you get what you pay for. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: bmazur45

customer_reviews.title: Great price for awesome lightweight airy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as indoor shoes for my kid for school. They are lightweight, super breezy, and cute too. The pull tabs on the top and back of shoes make it easy for little kids to put on. Would highly recommend this and it's a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the more expensive versions of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to the more expensive versions of these shoes. They won't last as long but with growing feet, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: cdpgreek

customer_reviews.title: BEST toddler shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time ordering shoes from this company! I have twin toddlers and I swear by these shoes for everyday use and pool use! I said they run a little big, but my kids have been able to wear them for almost 7 months at a time before outgrowing them. I’ve recommended these to all of my friends since they are so affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design of the shoe, but way too big. Sizing is not correct. Ordered twice and got way too big sizes. Super disappointed cause these would have been perfect if I could get a size that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fits little wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's feet are wide with high arch, it is very hard to find any kind of shoes for her, but these fit, and she doesn't complain. Good for beach, pool, any kind of water activity. Non slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Too big, bulky and look cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Does not look like the picture. They are huge, bulky and look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ronzo

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I went a size up and the shoes fit perfect for my daughters Halloween costume- and they are easy to slip on and off. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: They're super cute. Will work as water shoes and look good enough to be regular shoes as well. They did have a little knick in them but not too noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Comfortable, dry quickly, easy to put on thanks to the handles, and super cute! I've gotten so many compliments on these! I've also noticed all the kids that wear the ones that speedo and toms make that look like a sock/closed shoe get smelly and dirty inside so these are perfect !
customer_reviews.author: RocioRG12

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old LOVES these shoes! She wears them not only for the water but with her everyday clothes too. They seem to be really good quality- sturdy and durable. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: The opening to slide the foot in is too tight to slide my 20 month old son’s foot through. Very disappointed in this product. And the toe area is narrow.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for my toddler. This is my second pair. They are great for water day at school, going to the water park, and other summer activities.
customer_reviews.author: Biz

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschool water day!
customer_reviews.text: My 3Y daughter uses it for her preschool water day and swimming pool. The shoes are perfect for running, jumping and water related activities. Great for kids!
customer_reviews.author: SnowSnow

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit a long and skinny foot.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell how the baby's bed's gonna grow and hers were long and skinny so guess you didn't work very well because it slipped off her heels for beginners. I can't find any that are long and skinny to fit her feet
customer_reviews.author: Barbi - Dallas Texas

customer_reviews.title: cute n comfy
customer_reviews.text: i love the price and i love the product its cute and easy to put on and take off and dries fast if you go in the water
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe but too big. I plan on ordering a smaller size--i sized up a little bit though based on other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these for my 1 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my 1 yr old!! Dry quickly. Fits perfect. Easy on/off. Great summer shoe for wet or dry play.
customer_reviews.author: Michele A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them. Size seems true to fit, unlike others experienced.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: very easy to put in and off
customer_reviews.text: Breathable, very easy to put in and off. Get compliments on how cute they are all the time!
customer_reviews.author: The shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great swim shoes for school
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and I ordered a half size up - fit perfectly. Great swim shoes for school!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Love these!! Will definitely
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves these!! Perfect for all things water and outdoors. Super well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Great little water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great little water shoes. Just didn't like that the insole came out so easily-other than that, good shoes for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Loryn Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes, love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. 3.5 kiddo uses it almost every day while playing with water, in the pool, etc.
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: big fit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but they run big I had to go down a size to fit my son .
customer_reviews.author: Marie M

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 8.5 but they are the same size s a number 7. Old Native shoes are size 7
customer_reviews.author: alequiring

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems comfortable, dries quickly. Serves it's purpose as camp pool shoes!
customer_reviews.author: shulamis goodfriend

customer_reviews.title: Great, but run small.
customer_reviews.text: Seem like really good quality, light, comfy and flexible. However they run really small. Order 1 size up for a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: broncofan

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughters and they don't want to take them off. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month is able to walk/run in these shoes well. Comfy, stay on, and soft.
customer_reviews.author: N. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great, son's foot does not over heat, can get wet but will dry quicker than standard shoes
customer_reviews.author: Pastur

customer_reviews.title: My 3yo loves these shoes. She calls them her ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo loves these shoes. She calls them her "happy shoes" because of the smiley faces on the pull tab. They're holding up well as play shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Buy Jeneric

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and my daughter likes to wear them. That’s about all I can ask for :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Baranski

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, not to difficult to take on and off. They run a size or more small.
customer_reviews.author: Carla D

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Run small. Tight on top. Hard for children to put on by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Works great for my 18 month old who ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Works great for my 18 month old who is always on the move climbing, getting in and out of wading pool.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little shoe for toddlers on the go. Easy to get on and off and great for the water.
customer_reviews.author: Paige H.

customer_reviews.title: We love these and are happy we purchased them
customer_reviews.text: Cute, fit well and help my little guy run around the water park. We love these and are happy we purchased them. Holding up with twice weekly use halfway through the summer so far!
customer_reviews.author: E. Naden

customer_reviews.title: Either due to size or poor design all teh sand gets stuck in there
customer_reviews.text: Too tight to be a 5/6 size. Either due to size or poor design all teh sand gets stuck in there, despite the mesh, and gets uncomfy for baby after a while. I think they may have worked if they were a size or two bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Yashvi Kundel

product_meta.title: RVROVIC Kids Slip-on Breathable Mesh Sneakers Summer Beach Water Shoes Toddler/Little Kid
feature_bullets: FEATURE: Combined sneaker with water shoes, slip resistance, light, durable and sturdy.
DESIGN: Anti-collision toe, consolidation, perfect for walking, running, swimming, sports.
MACHINE WASHABLE: Shoes can be machine washable. Sand and mud on the shoes just need a quick once-over.
SIZE: Many customers reflect this style shoes are smaller than usual, so we'd better you choose half size up. Or if you have any question, please feel free to contact with us.
100% Satisfaction Guaranteed Zero Hassle Returns - Return your shoes for any reason.
